description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience fast paced hockey action with your friends at home, in an online match or by playing single player against the computer. You can create your own hockey team and battle for the win in local matches or online matches. Be prepared for hockey action!
